description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take control of the deadliest ranger the elven race has ever known.  Use magic arrows and summon dragons to bring down waves of enemies you never thought possible.  There are several modes of play for both novice and experienced players.
description.short: Take control of the deadliest ranger the elven race has ever known.  Use magic arrows and summon dragons to bring down waves of enemies you never thought possible.  There are several modes of play for both novice and experienced players.
